excerpt.rendered:
The Menu of the day is ordered until 15:00 pm

28 lei without dessert / 41 lei with dessert

Thursday

Black Beans Soup – vegan / gluten free / paper bio container / 330 ml (black bean, celery, carrot, white onion, tomato, olive oil, natural condiments, himalayan salt)

Grill Champinion & Pleurotus Mushrooms with Eggplant – vegan / gluten free / paper bio container / 300 g (eggplants, pleurotus, red bell pepper, tomato, pepper white onion, olive oil, natural condiments, himalayan slat)

Whole Wheat Bread – vegan / with gluten / 70 g (whole wheat, yeast, olive oil, himalayan salt)

or gluten free option

Onion & Olive Crackers Bread – raw / gluten free / 50 g (white onion, millet, black olive, hemp seed, flaxseed, natural condiments, himalayan salt)

Pear, Banana and Pineapple Cake – raw / gluten free / 110 g (coconut, cashew, pears, almonds, banana, pineapple, cocoa butter, vanilla, goji, lemon, unfiltered honey)
